pullRequest.title: Simplify PR template, remove 'functional changes' checkbox list
pullRequest.bodyText:
This update removes the checkbox list & simplifies some of
the leading content to be less verbose.
We often skip the checkbox list, hopefully the type of functional
change being submitted is obvious by the commit commentary. If
that is not obvious, then it will not be obvious to maintainers
viewing the code commit history.

Functional Changes

[] New map or map update
[] New Feature
[] Feature update or enhancement
[x] Feature Removal
[] Code Cleanup or refactor
[x] Configuration Change
[] Problem fix
[] Other:   
Testing

Screens Shots

Additional Notes to Reviewer

Release Note

commit.message:
Simplify PR template, remove 'functional changes' checkbox list

This update removes the checkbox list & simplifies some of
the leading content to be less verbose.

We often skip the checkbox list, hopefully the type of functional
change being submitted is obvious by the commit commentary. If
that is not obvious, then it will not be obvious to maintainers
viewing the code commit history.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,24 +1,11 @@
 
 <!--
   Commit comment above summarizing the update.  If multiple commits please
-  summarize the change above. Commit comments should include an overview of
-  the updates and the goal and reasoning behind the update.
+  summarize the change above.
